response.overview: This house was named as the haunted house which is the home of all the vengeful ghosts who committed suicide. The story of the death by hanging the neck in the house keeps haunting everyone. People don't dare to walk across that house after dark. Neasa used this to threaten her boyfriend by lying that she would come and kill herself here like everyone else. But as soon as those terrifying, spiteful ghosts entered them, they had to face all of their fears in order to survive. Could they get through it?
response.title: Dark House
